response.overview: Pardhu (Larencce) does menial jobs in Dubai and saves every penny he earns and sends it to his family in Usilampatti. A flashback reveals that he was a carefree youth, who is often chided by his father (Nazar). His elder brother (Sreeman) is the blue-eyed boy of his father. However Pardhu's mother (Saranya) showers all her love and affection on him. Watch the movie to see how Pardhu proves himself to the members of his family.
response.title: Pardhu
